com.facebook.buck.core.model.targetgraph

Interface DescriptionWithTargetGraph<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The object describing the parameters to be passed to the BuildRule. How this is processed is described in the class level javadoc of ConstructorArgMarshaller.

XcodePrebuildScriptDescription, XcodeWorkspaceConfigDescription, ZipFileDescription

    public interface DescriptionWithTargetGraph<T>
extends Description<T>
    The Source of Truth about a BuildRule, providing mechanisms to expose the arguments that rules derived from the Buildable take and providing a factory for those BuildRules. It is expected that instances of this class are stateless.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BuildRule createBuildRule(BuildRuleCreationContextWithTargetGraph context, BuildTarget buildTarget, BuildRuleParams params, T args)
      Create a BuildRule for the given BuildRuleParams.
      default boolean producesCacheableSubgraph()
      Whether or not the build rule subgraph produced by this Description is safe to cache in IncrementalActionGraphGenerator for incremental action graph generation.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.facebook.buck.core.description.BaseDescription

        getConstructorArgType

    • Method Detail

      • createBuildRule

        BuildRule createBuildRule(BuildRuleCreationContextWithTargetGraph context,
                          BuildTarget buildTarget,
                          BuildRuleParams params,
                          T args)
        Create a BuildRule for the given BuildRuleParams. Note that the BuildTarget referred to in the params contains the Flavor to create.
        Parameters:
        buildTarget -
        args - A constructor argument, of type as returned by BaseDescription.getConstructorArgType().
        Returns:
        The BuildRule that describes the default flavour of the rule being described.

      • producesCacheableSubgraph

        default boolean producesCacheableSubgraph()
        Whether or not the build rule subgraph produced by this Description is safe to cache in IncrementalActionGraphGenerator for incremental action graph generation.
        Specified by:
        producesCacheableSubgraph in interface Description<T>
